title: GamesLibri
description: GamesLibri is a React-based web application designed to help users discover amazing free games. It provides a seamless interface to explore a curated list of games with detailed information and responsive design for an optimal user experience.

title: Ansible Playbooks for Web Server and Website Deployment
description: Automates the installation and configuration of Nginx and Apache servers, along with website deployment. It ensures efficient, consistent, and scalable web hosting with minimal manual effort.

title: ZidioBlog
description: For the tech blog website design at Zidio Development, I analyzed company targets, then created wireframes and final designs in Figma, ensuring a user-friendly and appealing website.

title: Zidio E-commerce
description: Designed an intuitive and visually appealing e-commerce website using Figma, ensuring a seamless user experience. Conducted through market research and created detailed wireframes to meet Zidio's targets.
